incidents.name: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R832A08 incident notification
incidents.message: We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary issue in the rack R832A08. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 03/10/2025 17:30 UTC Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the rack R832A08 are temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Customers are currently unable to access and use their servers in the specified rack. Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
